title: Still no All-Star icon
body: Been a few days since I done it on the few acc's I have and none of them have received the icon yet; anyone else having this problem also?

replies.body: It's going to take up to 3 days to receive the all star icons.  The even is just rolling out, so give it some time to roll out to everyone.  To make certain, you're logged into the intended account while submitting votes?  If you haven't received it in a week, let me know!
Alright thanks for the info; I'll let you know if I don't see anything by the 8th!
Thanks for the quick reply! and I voted on each account so each one should receive the icon right?
Yep, each account that participates will unlock the content!  :D
